channel.title: Shop sells 50 at a time instead of 10. (Still need assistance, Thanks.)
channel.description: Hey, my shop sells 50 at a time instead of 10. How do I change it back to 10 at a time? :( Thanks for reading. (317 Delta Source) -Jim

item.title: Shop sells 50 at a time instead of 10. (Still need assistance, Thanks.)
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

[quote=“Perses Pkers, post:6, topic:365563”][quote author=usman555 link=topic=461765.msg3378167#msg3378167 date=1287803713]

[quote author=Perses Pkers link=topic=461765.msg3378161#msg3378161 date=1287803591]

[quote author=usman555 link=topic=461765.msg3378112#msg3378112 date=1287802446]

[quote author=Perses Pkers link=topic=461765.msg3378110#msg3378110 date=1287802383]
hey sorry if im wrong but you been sitting there for like 20 min so ill give you a idea… here it is:
you go into client.java and find the shops then it should say like “1” “5” “10” “X” And Then Below it somewhere (possibaly in clickingMost.java) There Will Be When You Click On “10” you resesve “10” Of That Item… well change both those 10’s to 50 and then compile… again sorry if im wrong just trying to help a fellow moparscape player
[/quote]Don’t post what you don’t know.
[/quote]omfg… no1 else was posting this is it but im not sure on codes so shutup unlike you im trying to help…
[/quote]How can you help if you aren’t giving the correct information? And do you HAVE to post on a thread if it hasn’t been posted on? Huh?
[/quote] i was just try to be helpful so get off my back…[/quote]And I’m just pointing out it was wrong…

Read full topic
